channel.title: LOSTCasts
channel.media:copyright: Copyright 2005, LOSTCasts.com. Not affiliated with the actual show LOST
channel.itunes:author: LOSTCasts
channel.itunes:subtitle: LOSTCasts is a weekly podcast for hardcore fans of the hit ABC television series LOST. Every week we talk about the latest theories and speculation happening online.
channel.itunes:summary: LOSTCasts is a weekly podcast for hardcore fans of the hit ABC television series LOST. Every week we talk about the latest theories and speculation happening online.
channel.feedburner:browserFriendly: This is an XML content feed. It is intended to be viewed in a newsreader or syndicated to another site, subject to copyright and fair use.

item.title: End of an Era... Thanks!
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
It certainly has been an interesting ride... We started podcasting in season 2, and so much has happened in that time. When we started the podcast, we took a different approach. Our motto was "we read the forums so you don't have to." It was all about getting the great thinking of the fans out there, and we enjoyed it. I can quite honestly say I don't think I'll have another experience quite like this in my lifetime. So much happened over the last 5 years - Matt and Robert both had children (as well as some of our fans!), I met Tasha on the podcast and we got married, and much more.

I have a few people to thank...

Thanks to Matt, Robert and Brian Linder for hanging in there through the last 5 years. It certainly wasn't as much fun podcasting without all of you.

Thanks to Rob Van Den Berg for being as committed to the podcast as we were. You're a good friend, even though we've never met, and you'll be in our thoughts this summer - good luck!

Thanks to Jorge Garcia and the other official LOST folks who took the time to send us emails and reach out to us. It made our experience that much more rewarding.

Thanks to our most loyal fans - you know who you are! There are far too many to mention, but we appreciate the time you spent sending us emails, taking the time to record voicemails... it wouldn't have been possible without you.

There are many others who are just starting the journey of discovering LOST. We'll leave the site up for them, and as a home for the community we helped build. I'll drop in from time to time to check out the site, keep up with Facebook and our email, and we'll let you know if we start anything new.

Stay LOST,

John

item.title: LOSTCasts 91: The End
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
Yes, this is our final podcast, for the season 6 finale of LOST, and indeed, the series finale. Join Matt, Robert, John and Tasha as we talk about the finale, overall impressions of the show, and the legacy of the series.

Download podcast #90 here
Watch live recorded video cast here

What, you expected links? This is the last podcast... it's all talk :)

Stay LOST!

item.title: Final Podcast: This Sunday
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
We're getting together this weekend to talk about the series finale, and indeed, the whole season. Join in the conversation by leaving a comment here, sending us an email, visiting our Facebook Page or calling our automated audio comment hotline at: 206-376-0219.

We'll be podcasting on Sunday at 11am CST if you'd like to join us live via video chat at: Ustream.tv/lostcasts.
item.description: We're getting together this weekend to talk about the series finale, and indeed, the whole season. Join in the conversation by leaving a comment here, sending us an email, visiting our Facebook Page or calling our automated audio comment hotline...

item.title: LOSTCasts 90: Penultimate Podcast
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
That's right... this is not our last podcast (we'll podcast in a week or two after the finale has aired), but this is our penultimate podcast! In this podcast, we chat about our latest two episodes of season 6 of LOST, episode 15 - Across the Sea and episode 16 - What They Died For. Join Matt and John as we talk about these recent episodes, as well as the finale, and our predictions for the final two hours of LOST airing tonight, May 23rd.

Download podcast #90 here
Watch live recorded video cast here

item.title: LOSTCasts 89: The Candidate
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
This week's podcast focuses on season 6, episode 14 of LOST, The Candidate. Join Matt and John as we talk about the story arc of the flash-sideways, question Jack's ultimate role as a Jacob replacement, question how candidates get crossed off the list, what surprises the writers may have in store for the finale, best and worst spin-off shows, and much more.

Download podcast #89 here
Watch live recorded video cast here

Links related to the podcast:
LOST Live event website - buy tickets or submit questions

LOST links:
LOST Wristbands website
LOST Marathon Watching for charity
LOST Limericks on The Fuselag

Remember, our next podcast will be the Saturday before the finale, on the 22nd... See you then! Stay LOST!

item.title: LOSTCasts 88: The Last Recruit
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
This week's podcast focuses on season 6, episode 13 of LOST, The Last Recruit. Join Matt, Robert and John as we talk about the convergence of characters in the flash sideways, and speculation about them all coming together, Jack's struggle with Locke, Desmond's new role and his influence over Sayid, Jack leaving the group and his return with Locke... of course, we have give some ideas about what we think the end game is.

Download podcast #88 here
We had a little audio trouble, so first part of the podcast is a bit quieter than the second half. Also, Ustream kept cutting out, so no video this week.

Links related to the podcast:
Wikipedia on the number 42
Conversation on The Fuselage about what makes a candidate

LOST links:
Wired article on LOST
LOST tarot cards on Flickr
LOST photo group on Flickr

Finale links:
LOST Live music event on May 13
LOST Fathom Events Times Talk Live May 20

Remember, LOST is taking a break next week, so we'll see you in a couple weeks.

item.title: LOSTCasts 87: Happily Ever After & Everybody Loves Hugo
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
This week's podcast focuses on episodes 11 and 12 of LOST, season 6 - Happily Ever After and Everybody Loves Hugo. Join Matt and John as we talk about these Desmond and Hurley centric episodes, including speculation about the alternate timelines, Desmond's role as a possible candidate, the struggle between MIB and Jacob, the overall theme of love and hate and much more.

Download podcast #87 here
Watch live recorded video cast here

Links related to the podcast:
Wikipedia entry for Notes from the Underground

LOST links:
Video of Desmond and Jack meeting first time
Official cast photos from ABC

We'll see you next week! Stay LOST!

item.title: LOSTCasts 86: The Package
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
This latest podcast focuses on season 6, episode 10 of LOST, The Package. Join John and Matt as we talk about Sun and Jin's flash-sideways, the destinies of the candidates and former candidates, the roles of Jacob and the man in black, speculation about he finale and much more.

Download podcast #86 here
Watch live recorded video cast here: part 1 & part 2

Links related to the podcast:
Wikipedia on Pandora's Box
Wikipedia on the DC Multiverse
Wikipedia on Crisis on Infinite Earths

We'll see you next week! Stay LOST.

item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
Our latest podcast focuses on season 6, episode 9 of LOST, Ab Aeterno. Join Robert and John as we talk about Richard's past, the history of the island and speculation about Jacob, candidates, Ben, the finale and much more.

Download podcast #85 here
Watch live recorded video cast here

Links related to the podcast:
Doc Jensen on Ab Aeterno
Wikipedia on Romulus and Remus
Wikipedia on The Howling Man

LOST Links:
LOST island in Just Cause 2
Explaining LOST to someone who doesn't watch

Join us next week... until then, Stay LOST!

item.title: LOSTCasts 84: Dr. Linus & Recon
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
This week's podcast focuses on the last two episodes of LOST, season 6, Dr. Linus and Recon. Join Tasha and John as we talk about Ben's redemption and possible importance as a candidate, and Sawyer's continued inability to make a choice or move beyond his old ways of revenge and the con.

Download podcast #84 here
Watch live recorded video cast here

Links related to the podcast:
Wikipedia on Napoleon
Wikipedia on novel The Chose

LOST Links:
ABC LOST promo contest
LOST page on Hulu

We'll see you next week! Stay LOST.

item.title: LOSTCasts 83: Sundown
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
This latest podcast focuses on season 6, episode 6 of LOST, Sundown. Join Matt, Robert and John as we talk about this latest episode of LOST, including Sayid's flash sideways, interesting new connections to Egyptian symbolism, speculation about the path of each of our losties, thoughts on the final season and much more.

Download podcast #83 here
Watch live recorded video cast here

Links related to the podcast:
Screencap of Keamy's watch
Wikipedia on Egyptian Book of the Dead

Wikipedia on Ammut (Ammit), Devourer of Hearts
Wikipedia on Shen Ring

LOST Links:
Springfield Punx "Simsonize" Losties
LOST Untangles video
Io9.com

Just a reminder that we won't be podcasting next weekend, but we'll see you the week after! Stay LOST...

item.title: LOSTCasts 82: The Lighthouse
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
This week's podcast focuses on Season 6, Episode 5 of LOST, The Lighthouse. Join John and Tasha as we talk about Jack's new life off-island and his son David, speculation about connections between the plot and Alice's Adventures in Wonderland and Through the Looking Glass, Jack and Hurley's journey to the lighthouse, revisiting the sickness and much more.

Download podcast #82 here

Watch the live recorded video cast here

Links related to the podcast:
Screencap of Jacob's directions
Screencap of Jack's name on the wheel, bigger

Screencap of Kate's name on the wheel
Wallace's name on the wheel
Wikipedia on Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
Wikipedia on Through the Looking Glass
LOSTpedia on the sickness

LOST links:
SyFy wire LOST questions and answers

Make sure to let us know about your top 10 questions you'd like to see LOST answer by the end of the show. See you next week! Stay LOST!

item.title: LOSTCasts 81: What Kate Does and The Substitute
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
This latest podcast focuses on season 6 of LOST, episodes 3 and 4, What Kate Does and The Substitute. Join Robert, John and Tasha as we talk about the lukewarm reactions to episode 3, but explore some of the important topics that carry over into the highest rated show of season 6, episode 4 of LOST, The Substitute. In that conversation, we speculate on the meaning of the numbers, the relationship between Jacob and the man in black, previous candidates, and the roles of our losties as potential candidates.

Download podcast #81 here

Note: Our Ustream live broadcast had audio this time, but unfortunately did not archive. We're still figuring it out... Next week will be smooth sailing :)

Links related to the podcast:
Episode rankings from Dark UFO
Sri Lanka video on Lostpedia
Number reference list on 4815162342.com
Jorge Garcia on The Substitute

LOST links:
Fan Initiative website

See you next week! Stay LOST.

item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
We'll be back this weekend with a combined podcast for episodes 3 and 4 of the final season of LOST, What Kate Does and The Substitute. Join in the conversation by leaving a comment here, sending us an email, visiting our Facebook Page or calling our automated audio comment hotline at: 206-376-0219.

We will be streaming live via our Ustream channel as well, on Sunday, February 21st, but we haven't nailed down an exact time yet. Stay tuned and we'll let you know when.

Update: We'll be podcasting at 11am central time. See you then!

item.title: LOSTCasts 80: LA X Parts 1 & 2
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
This week, we discuss the premiere of season 6 of LOST, with the airing of LA X Parts 1 & 2. In our first podcast of the season, we talk about the new parallel universe or "flash sideways" everyone's been talking about and if our Losties are destined to repeat the past, speculate about who the man in black may have impersonated besides Locke, discuss our new temple friends and more... all the while trying our first live video broadcast, which began a little bumpy but smoothed out in the end. We'll have it fine tuned and working without issue next time :)

Download podcast #80 here

Watch the archived live broadcast on our Ustream page
(reminder - audio doesn't work until about 20 minutes in)

Links related to the podcast:
Side-by-side video of Jack on plane
Grandfather paradox on Wikipedia
Fear and Trembling on Wikipedia
Wikipedia on the Ankh
Wikipedia on Dogen

LOST Links:
New podcast from Jorge Garcia - Geronimo Jack's Beard
815sentencesaboutLOST.com

Stay LOST!

item.title: Get Ready: LOSTCasts 80 - Season 6 Premiere
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
Robert, Matt and John are back for the final season of LOST, season 6. We got a great pair of new episodes of LOST last night, with the airing of LA X parts 1 & 2. Join in the conversation by leaving a comment here, sending us an email, visiting our Facebook Page or calling our automated audio comment hotline at: 206-376-0219.

Also, we're trying something new this season. You can join us live as we podcast on Sunday, February 4th at 11am Central Time by visiting our new Ustream account: Ustream.tv/lostcasts.
item.description: Robert, Matt and John are back for the final season of LOST, season 6. We got a great pair of new episodes of LOST last night, with the airing of LA X parts 1 & 2. Join in the conversation...

item.title: LOSTCasts on Facebook
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded: We have secured our Facebook URL now. If you'd like to access our Facebook Page directly, you can find us at facebook.com/lostcasts.
item.description: We have secured our Facebook URL now. If you'd like to access our Facebook Page directly, you can find us at facebook.com/lostcasts.

item.title: Back for Season 6, New and Improved!
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
It's almost time for season 6 to start, and we've got a few new changes for this season. First off, we've set up a Facebook Page you can find here. The LOSTCasts Facebook Page has discussion boards, and will allow listeners to upload photos, video and more. Of course, we'll still be using comments on the blog, the Facebook Page is just a new way for us to interact.

We're also going to try using live video this year through Ustream or Justin.tv. We haven't sorted this out exactly yet, but this should allow you to interact with us live each week. We'll have more details soon.

One of the ways we hope to interact with you is by sending questions directly to us via our new Twitter account: http://www.twitter.com/lostcasts.

So what are your thoughts on this final season of LOST, season 6? Post a comment here, on one of the various other channels we've set up. As always, you can send us an audio comment through our automated audio voicemail (note the new number!): 206-376-0219.

Stay LOST!

item.title: LOSTCasts 79: The Incident
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
In this final podcast focuses on the season 5 finale of LOST, The Incident, parts 1&2. Join Matt, Robert and John as we talk about Jacob and his "adversary", speculation about their rivalry and the "loophole." We also discuss what might be in store for next season and the finale of the show.

Download podcast #79 here

Links related to the podcast:
Screencap of Jacob's tapestry
Wikipedia entry for Sobek
Enotes on Flannery O'Conner's Everything that Rises Must Converge

Join us next season! Stay LOST!

item.content:encoded: Season 5 of LOST is over with the airing of The Incident last night. Join Robert, Matt and John this weekend as we podcast on the season 5 finale, and speculate about what's to come. Leave your comments for the cast here!

item.title: LOSTCasts 78: Follow the Leader
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
This podcast focuses on season 5, episode 15 of LOST, Follow the Leader. Join Matt and John as we discuss Jack's task, Locke's new role and speculation about the season finale and what's to come next season.

Download podcast #78 here

Links related to podcast:
Ask Ausiello on LOST finale
Kristen at E! Online on LOST

We'll see you next week! Stay LOST!

item.title: Podcast Next Weekend
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded: We won't be podcasting this weekend, as we couldn't get our schedules to match up. We'll be back next weekend, as the countdown to the season 5 finale continues. Stay LOST!
item.description: We won't be podcasting this weekend, as we couldn't get our schedules to match up. We'll be back next weekend, as the countdown to the season 5 finale continues. Stay LOST!

item.title: LOSTCasts 77: Theory Cast
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
We're back after our hiatus, and rather than waste time recapping the 4 episodes of LOST that have aired since our last podcast, it was time to refocus by revisiting theories prior to next week's 100th episode. Join Matt and John as we revisit some favorite old theories, discuss the theories the LOST producers have debunked and talk about a couple new theories worth paying attention to.

Download podcast #77 here

Links related to the podcast:
Best theories list on 4815162342.com
Best LOST theories on Squidoo
Oldie but goodie - the ultimate theory
Atlantis rebuilt theory
Time Loop theory
Eye M Sick

Join us next week! Stay LOST!

item.title: We're Back! Get Ready!
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
John and Tasha have returned from their honeymoon! Since we don't TRULY have a new episode for two weeks, we'll be podcasting on the last three episodes next Sunday, April the 26th. Tell us what you'd like to talk about by leaving your comments here.

And by the way, do you know what lies in the shadow of the statue?

item.title: LOSTCasts 76: Namaste
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
This podcast focuses on season 5, episode 9 of LOST, Namaste. Join John and Matt, as we discuss the time differences between our two groups of Losties, the swan station, creepy Ben as a kid, Christian and Sun.

Download podcast #76 here

Links related to the podcast:
Lostpedia entry for Namaste
Screencap of swan model and blueprint
Screencap of creepy Ben as a kid
Screencap of Christian and Sun, with third person in background

We'll be back with another podcast on April 12th! Until then, Stay LOST!

item.title: LOSTCasts 75: LaFleur
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
This podcast focuses on season 5, episode 8 of LOST, LaFleur. Join Robert, John and Matt as we discuss speculation around the 4-toed statue's Egyptian roots and other Egyptian references, our Losties' newfound roles in Dharma, conversations about the truce between Dharma and Alpert and much more.

Download podcast #75 here

Links related to the podcast:
Wikipedia on Anubis
Wikipedia on Taweret
Wikipedia on the Ankh symbol
Wikipedia on Horus
Egyptian necklace in ABC store
Screencap of white king missing in chess game

Join us in two weeks for another podcast! Stay LOST!

item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
This podcast focuses on season 5, episode 7 of LOST, The Life and Death of Jeremy Bentham. Join Matt and John as we question Ben's role as protector of the island, speculation about the upcoming "war" Widmore mentions, where we're at in the timeline on the island, Walt's future role and more.

Download podcast #74 here

Links related to the podcast:
Lostpedia on episode 7
Screencap of Hurley's Sphinx drawing
Edgar from UK's pictures of Jeremy Bentham pub

Join us next week for another episode and a new podcast! Stay LOST.

item.title: LOSTCasts 73: 316
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
This latest podcast focuses on season 5, episode 6 of LOST, 316. Join Robert, Matt and John as we discuss mixed reactions to the episode, speculation about events that led up to the island return, the new lamp post station, Ben's bloody phonecall, our losties trading places with one another as "proxies" and  much more.

Download podcast #73 here

Links related to the podcast:
Lostpedia on 316
Island photo in the Lamp Post
Wikipedia on The Wilhelm scream
Wikipedia on James Joyce's Ulysses

See you next week! Stay LOST!

item.title: LOSTCasts 72: This Place is Death
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
Podcast 72 focuses on season 5, episode 5 of LOST, This Place is Death. Join Robert and John as we talk about the major reveals in this episode, including confirmation about the smoke monster and the sickness, speculation about the temple and the hieroglyphics, Charlotte's past, Christian Shepard, Ben and Locke, Ms. Hawking and more.

Download podcast #72 here

Links related to the podcast:
Lostpedia episode summary
Doc Artz on hieroglyphics
Wikipedia on Carthage
Wikipedia on Hannibal
The Fuselage thread on the well and fountain of youth
Caravaggio painting - Incredulity of St. Thomas

LOST links:
BBC on time travel and future outcomes
Nielsen - LOST most watched online TV show

See you next week! Stay LOST...

item.title: LOSTCasts 71: Jughead and The Little Prince
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
This podcast focuses on season 5, episodes 3 & 4 of LOST, Jughead and The Little Prince. Join Robert, Matt and John as we discuss general reactions and changes from seasons past, as well as time travel and speculation about the connections between characters, the literary meaning of The LIttle Prince, Ajira Airways and much more.

Download podcast #71 here

Links related to podcast:
Wikipedia on Jughead and Operation Castle
Wikipedia on Vulgar Latin
Wikipedia on The Little Prince
Ajira Airways website

Washington Post on LOST

Join us next week for another podcast! Stay LOST..

item.title: Get Ready: LOSTCasts 71 & 72
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
Update: We are indeed on for this weekend! With another great episode last night, season 5, episode 3 of LOST, The Little Prince. Join us this weekend as we talk about both episode 3 & 4!

We got another great episode of LOST last night, with the airing of season 5, episode 3 of LOST, Jughead. Unfortunately, we won't be podcasting this weekend as John is out of town, but we'll be back next weekend with a combined podcast for episodes 3 and 4. In preparation for that podcast, send us your thoughts on Jughead by sending us an email, posting a comment here, or leaving us an audio comment by calling our automated audio comment voicemail at 206-984-3516. We'll see you next weekend! Stay LOST.

item.title: LOSTCasts 70: Because You Left and The Lie
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded:
Yes, it's our first podcast in almost a year! This podcast focuses on the two part premiere of season 5 of LOST, Because You Left and The Lie. Join John, Matt and Robert as we speculate about time travel and what it means to the show, Faraday's relationship to Ms. Hawking, Locke and Alpert, the whispers and much more.

Download podcast #70 here

Links related to the podcast:
General reactions Dark UFO
Video of Alpert's test of young Locke
Lostpedia on Ms. Hawking

LOST links:
Popular Mechanics on LOST season premiere
Adam from Mythbusters on LOST season premiere
J. Wood on season premiere

It's great to be back! We should have a new number set up for audio comments soon...

Update: We have a new audio comment #: 206-984-3516

Stay LOST!

item.title: New Podcast This Weekend!
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded: Yes, LOST is finally back tonight. Matt, Robert and I weren't able to pull together a podcast over the holiday, but we're excited to be back this weekend, podcasting on the premiere episode of season 5 of LOST. Leave your comments here, or send us an email!

item.title: LOST, Anyone?
item.dc:creator: lostcasts@gmail.com (LOSTCasts)
item.content:encoded: It's been way too long since LOST has been on the air. In fact, it's been soo long that we really haven't had much of a reason to do a podcast. We'll do some sort of podcast prior to the season starting again... at least to get everyone caught up with where we left off, and what's to com. It probably won't be until after the holidays, around the first of the year...
